name: healthx-appointment-system
description: Complete doctor appointment management system with patient frontend, admin panel, and doctor portal

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run backend:dev" "npm run frontend:dev" "npm run admin:dev"
scripts.build: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix admin && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:admin
scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix admin

author: HealthX Team
